body: Summary: He was going to kill himself, then the weird girl told him he was going to die and made him question if he had any regrets. After raping the first two girls he wakes up the next day like it was all a dream, but the weird girl shows up again and asks why he's still alive. He realizes he's in a loop and decides to go after new girls every day. It doesn't really explain who the mysterious girl is, but the last page seems like some kind of hint.
@RED-ENERGY I think she's a hallucination. Page 53 leads me to believe that when MC was a kid, he stumbled upon her being raped. That's what sparked his own loli rape fetish. Just a guess though.
He should rape that girl on train station instead
I wonder what the deal is with that girl in the train station
Huh, that title is still vague... I wonder if some people will still not see it.
